name: Poker
text: Activate: Main Once Per Turn You may place 3 cards from your trash to the bottom of your deck in any order. Give up to 2 [SMILE] type Characters +2000 power during this turn.

effect.text: You may place 3 cards from your trash to the bottom of your deck in any order. Give up to 2 [SMILE] type Characters +2000 power during this turn.
